commit message:
added error notification when ACTION_SHUTDOWN was not sent on last
shutdown
separate process for baackground sensor listener

restart service when task is removed (due to 'swiping away' the app in
the recent apps list)

start sensorlistener as foreground service until the Android
4.4.2-START_STICKY-bug is fixed

newDayAlarm now wakes the device to make sure the broadcast is deliverd
at midnight
green bars if goal was reached for that day
about dialog shows app version name
onClickListener on Graph instead of text
avoid fragment replacement on orientation change
only load last 5 entries on logging
restart workaround moved to onStartCommand method
changed to setExact for the alarm
Updated readme to use inline linking

Merge pull request #3 from yoasif/patch-1

added open source notice in about dialog

uses applicationcontext for alarm (maybe that will fix the alarm being
canceled?), calls NewDayReceiver if there is no entry for today yet (in
case the alarm was somehow canceled)
check if there is already an entry for the new day
added dashclock api to build instructions

ApplicationContext for broadcast & prevent for inserting
-Interger.MIN_VALUE for yesterday
new day check moved to onStart
removed insertDay method from overview fragment

moved logic to update yesterdays steps on a new day in the new method
Database.insertNewDay

Create strings.xml

Update strings.xml
